Introduction

VIOLET was a five member girl group under AfreecaTV. They were formed through the survival audition project Best of Best. They debuted on September 1, 2019 with the single "PangPang".

They are presumed to have disbanded some time in 2019 or 2020 due to lack of releases and activity on their social media.
